directions: In a small bowl whisk together the lemon juice, the vinegar, the mustard, and salt and pepper to taste, add the oil in a stream, whisking, and whisk the dressing until it is emulsified.
In a bowl toss together the radicchio, the fennel, the walnuts, the Roquefort, and the dressing. On each of 8 plates arrange some of the arugula and divide the radicchio mixture among the plates.
ingredients: 1/2 cup walnuts, toasted, cooled, and chopped
6 cups arugula, coarse stems discarded and the leaves washed well and spun dry
title: Radicchio, Fennel, and Arugula Salad with Roquefort and Walnuts
